functions.print_tabulate(content)[source]

Function prints selected books in tabulate mode

functions.search(subject, value)[source]

Function takes arguments from other function, search book by Author or Title, depends on the user requirements and display results in tabulate

functions.send_email(receiver, email_content)[source]

Function uses yagmail.SMTP protocol allowing user to send an email

functions.switch_message(value)[source]

Function contains different print messages and use them in various parts of the program.

Function validates entered user email address
